twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 - #43
twitch_info.description: hardest save of the game so far here

message.body: But you always say that you'll stop soon at like 3 hours
then Max says he will stream for only 1h and streams actually for 10h
Cn2.5 is the most addictive game ever
cn2.5 has such a high replayability factor
meanwhile I've just been addicted to peglin and balatro
gonna stream the newest biob avoidance once I get back home tho
My right paw is so dead because of the last week's ~28 hours of cn2.5
my current mood is being megaman battle network
did you ever see the uff referencias image max
you should try it, it's pretty fun honestly
I am not a fan of card games
Isn't balatro like a gambling game or something so it make sense that it's addictive
i also sent it to kai
i have a friend who used to be a balatro addict
I'd say it's more of a deck builder more than anyting
Balatro just doesnt look very interesting to me
but the higher difficulties definitely involve a lot of gambling in the early game
but tons of people love it and i get it
on the topic of puzzle games
I have balatro because of family sharing but I'd rather play cn2.5
have you tried Void Stranger, Max?
void stranger is one of my favorite games of all time
im very not bad at it but idk its just not that captivating
the only card game I liked was Hearthstone lol
is this the parabox?  no, this is Patrick
@torcado Void Stranger is an amazing puzzle game
I know that iru loves it
You'd probably enjoy Void Stranger then, it sounds like it would definitely be up your alley
all I know is you are a stranger in a void
The puzzle are pretty easy but the atmosphere is impeccable
I'd also say it's one of my absolute favourites in terms of story and atmosphere
and there are some very clever and fun puzzles
I am so glad Wolfi made me play Void Stranger
yeah I have the same issue. I temper it by being super selective with what I play
